item.title: 美国 9 月核心资本货物订单和发货量飙升
item.description: 9 月份，美国主要制成品资本货物的新订单激增，这些货物的出货量也稳健增长，巩固了经济学家对第三季度经济增长加速的预期。【原文：New orders for key U.S.-manufactured capital goods surged in September and shipments of these goods increased solidly, cementing economists' expectations that economic growth accelerated in the third quarter.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数下降，劳动力市场状况稳定
item.description: 尽管在经济不确定性挥之不去的情况下，劳动力市场正努力为失业者创造足够的就业机会，但上周新申请失业救济的美国人数有所下降，表明裁员人数仍然较少。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits fell last week, pointing to still-low layoffs, though the labor market is struggling to generate enough jobs for those out of work amid lingering economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 中国再次呼吁取消荷兰对 Nexperia 的收购
item.description: 中国商务部长王文涛周三与欧盟贸易委员马罗斯-塞夫科维奇（Maros Sefcovic）进行了视频通话，重申了中国政府的立场，即荷兰应取消9月30日对Nexperia公司的扣押，以及荷兰法院上个月下达的剥夺中国闻泰公司对这家总部位于荷兰的芯片制造商控制权的命令。【原文：China's commerce minister Wang Wentao in a video call with European Trade Commissioner Maros Sefcovic on Wednesday reiterated Beijing's position that the Netherlands should cancel its September 30 seizure of Nexperia, as well as a Dutch court order last month that stripped Chinese firm Wingtech of its control over the Netherlands-based chipmaker.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，中国监管机构禁止字节跳动使用 Nvidia 芯片
item.description: 据 The Information 周三援引两名公司员工的话报道，中国监管机构已禁止 TikTok 所有者字节跳动在新数据中心部署英伟达芯片。【原文：Chinese regulators have barred TikTok-owner ByteDance from deploying Nvidia chips in new data centers, The Information reported on Wednesday, citing two company employees.】

item.title: 诺和集团股价上涨，原因是美国医疗保险降价幅度基本符合预期
item.description: 诺和诺德的股价周三上涨了 5%，此前分析师称这家丹麦制药商的塞马鲁肽在美国的降价幅度基本符合预期。【原文：Novo Nordisk shares rose 5% on Wednesday after analysts said that U.S. price cuts for the Danish drugmaker's semaglutide came in broadly as expected.】

item.title: Meta 公司抨击欧盟对 Facebook 数据提出的 "反常 "反垄断要求
item.description: Meta Platforms 周三抨击欧盟反垄断监管机构在四年前的两次调查中提出的 "反常 "信息要求，凸显出企业对他们认为不相称的监管要求的反击日益强烈。【原文：Meta Platforms on Wednesday hit out at EU antitrust regulators for what it said were "aberrant" requests for information during two investigations four years ago, underscoring the increasing pushback by companies against what they see as disproportionate regulatory demands.】

item.title: 欧盟国家不再强迫大型科技公司检测和删除儿童色情制品
item.description: 欧盟成员国就在线儿童保护立法草案达成了共同立场，不强迫全球科技公司识别和删除在线儿童性虐待行为。【原文：European Union member states have agreed a common position on draft online child protection legislation without forcing global tech companies to identify and remove online child sexual abuse.】

item.title: 调查显示：世界各国央行对人工智能持谨慎态度，并努力退出美元汇率
item.description: 官方货币与金融机构论坛周三发布的一份调查报告显示，人工智能并不是全球大多数央行的核心业务，数字资产也不在考虑之列。【原文：Artificial Intelligence is not a core part of operations at most of the world's central banks and digital assets are off the table, according to a survey released on Wednesday by the Official Monetary and Financial Institutions Forum.】

item.title: 解说员：欧洲汽车制造商希望 2035 年内燃机禁令能缓一缓
item.description: 欧洲陷入困境的汽车制造商希望在布鲁塞尔下月公布的汽车行业一揽子计划中得到喘息的机会，该计划可能会淡化最初定于 2035 年实施的对新型内燃机的有效禁令，因为向电动发动机的转变正步履蹒跚。【原文：Europe's embattled carmakers are hoping for a reprieve when Brussels unveils an auto sector package next month, which could water down an effective ban on new combustion engines initially slated for 2035 as a shift towards electric engines stutters.】

item.title: 欧盟议会推动社交媒体年龄限制以保护未成年人
item.description: 欧洲议会周三呼吁欧盟设定儿童接触社交媒体的最低年龄，以应对青少年因过度接触社交媒体而导致心理健康问题增加的问题。【原文：The European Parliament called on Wednesday for the European Union to set minimum ages for children to access social media, to combat a rise in mental health problems among adolescents from excessive exposure.】

item.title: Adecco 称与 Salesforce 的合资企业有助于降低人工智能泡沫风险
item.description: Adecco 公司首席执行官周三表示，该公司与 Salesforce 成立的名为 r.Potential 的合资企业可以推动企业更具体地使用人工智能技术，从而帮助降低人工智能泡沫的风险。【原文：The chief executive of Adecco said on Wednesday that its joint venture with Salesforce , named r.Potential, could help reduce the risk of an AI bubble by pushing companies into more concrete uses of the technology.】

item.title: 纽约市审计长推动贝莱德撤资对马姆达尼构成考验
item.description: 纽约市主计长布拉德-兰德（Brad Lander）正敦促该市养老基金官员就气候问题重新招标贝莱德管理的 423 亿美元基金，这是民主党人对抗化石燃料行业共和党盟友对金融公司施压的首个重大举措。【原文：New York City Comptroller Brad Lander is urging city pension fund officials to rebid $42.3 billion managed by BlackRock over climate concerns, the first major move by a Democrat to counter pressure on financial companies from Republican allies of the fossil-fuel industry.】

item.title: 德国 Dertour 旅行社因政治因素影响需求，美国业绩下滑
item.description: Dertour 是德国领先的北美旅游服务提供商，该公司德国负责人表示，自唐纳德-特朗普总统上台以来，前往美国的预订量出现了两位数百分比的下滑，预计需求不会恢复。【原文：Dertour, Germany's leading provider of tours in North America, has recorded a double-digit percentage slump in bookings to the United States since President Donald Trump took office and does not expect demand to recover, said the firm's Germany head.】

item.title: 欧洲议会就呼吁社交媒体最低使用年龄的决议达成一致
item.description: 欧洲议会周三就一项决议达成一致，该决议呼吁将社交媒体的默认最低年龄设定为 16 岁，以确保 "适龄的在线参与"。【原文：The European Parliament on Wednesday agreed on a resolution which calls for a default minimum age of 16 on social media to ensure "age-appropriate online engagement".】

item.title: 早间竞标感谢经济坏消息
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 对冲基金的资金流向 高盛集团称，预算案迫在眉睫，对冲基金押注英国公司
item.description: 根据高盛（Goldman Sachs）的一份客户报告，选股型对冲基金目前拥有自 2023 年以来最大的空头头寸，持有与国内经济相关的英国股票。【原文：Stock-picking hedge funds now have the biggest short positions since 2023 on UK-based stocks exposed to the domestic economy, according to a Goldman Sachs client note.】

item.title: 12 月降息预期升温，华尔街期货走高，数据值得期待
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货走高，因为投资者对美联储可能在 12 月降息进行了定价，并在等待经济数据，以进一步明确全球最大经济体的健康状况。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Wednesday, as investors priced in a potential interest rate cut by the Federal Reserve in December and awaited economic data for greater clarity over the health of the world's largest economy.】

item.title: 迪尔预计年度利润因关税打击而疲软
item.description: 受关税影响和大型拖拉机利润率下降的打压，迪尔公司（Deere & Co）周三预测的年度利润低于预期，导致这家农用设备制造商的股价在盘前交易中下跌了 4%。【原文：Deere & Co forecast an annual profit below estimates on Wednesday, pressured by tariff impacts and weaker margins from its large tractors, sending the farm-equipment maker's shares down 4% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 欧盟委员会要求 Shein 提供有关销售非法产品的信息
item.description: 欧盟委员会周三在一份声明中说，根据欧盟《数字服务法案》（DSA），欧盟委员会已要求中国网络平台申音提供有关销售非法产品的信息。【原文：The European Commission has requested Chinese online platform Shein to provide information on the sale of illegal products under the EU's Digital Services Act (DSA), it said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 人工智能重塑购物方式，美国零售商试图改变人们对他们的在线印象
item.description: 传统上，大型零售商会在节日期间花费数百万吸引眼球。现在，他们希望通过人工智能代理来吸引眼球。【原文：Big retailers traditionally spend millions on attracting eyeballs for the holiday season. Now, they're looking to get noticed by something else - AI agents.】

item.title: 特朗普关税导致美国小型零售商面临假日供应混乱局面
item.description: 中国商品是美国零售商的生命线，特朗普对中国商品的关税翻转迫使小企业在支付高额关税或以更高成本寻找新供应商之间做出选择。【原文：Trump's tariff flip-flop on goods from China, a lifeline for U.S. retailers, have forced small firms to choose between paying steep levies or finding new suppliers at even higher cost.】

item.title: 解说员：这个黑色星期五，购物者在寻找什么？
item.description: 美国零售商正在为感恩节后的 "黑色星期五 "做准备，这一天将拉开假日购物季的序幕，通常占美国零售商全年利润的三分之一。【原文：Retailers in the U.S. are gearing up for Black Friday, the day after Thanksgiving, which kicks off the holiday shopping season that typically account for a third of U.S. retailers' annual profits.】

item.title: 德意志银行将 2026 年金价预期上调至 4450 美元/盎司
item.description: 德意志银行周三将2026年的黄金预期从每盎司4,000美元上调至4,450美元，理由是投资者流动趋于稳定，央行需求持续增长。【原文：Deutsche Bank raised its 2026 gold forecast to $4,450 an ounce from $4,000 on Wednesday, citing stabilising investor flows and persistent central bank demand.】

item.title: 信实工业公司与合资伙伴将投资 110 亿美元提升印度人工智能数据能力
item.description: 信实工业公司与印度南部安得拉邦政府周三表示，两家公司的合资企业将在五年内投资 110 亿美元，在安得拉邦开发 1 千兆瓦的人工智能数据容量。【原文：A Reliance Industries joint venture will invest $11 billion over five years to develop 1 gigawatt of AI data capacity in the southern Indian state of Andhra Pradesh, the companies and the state's government said on Wednesday.】

item.title: RWE 与阿波罗全球管理公司完成德国电网交易
item.description: 德国电力公司 RWE 和美国投资者阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）周三表示，他们成功完成了合资企业的合作交易，为德国电网升级提供资金。【原文：German power utility RWE and U.S. investor Apollo Global Management said on Wednesday that they successfully closed their partnership transaction for a joint venture to fund power grid upgrades in Germany.】

item.title: 瑞典 Embracer 出售两家游戏工作室，但保留关键版权
item.description: 瑞典视频游戏集团 Embracer 周三表示，该公司已经剥离了 Arc Games 和 Cryptic Studios，但保留了它们的一些关键权利。【原文：Swedish video game group Embracer has divested Arc Games and Cryptic Studios, but kept several of their key rights, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道路透社调查后，阿里巴巴禁售中国性玩偶卖家
item.description: 阿里巴巴旗下的阿里速卖通（AliExpress）称，在路透社对其销售的儿童性玩偶是否符合欧盟和美国法律进行审查后，该公司已禁止一家中国卖家在其市场上销售此类产品。【原文：Alibaba's AliExpress said it has banned a China-based seller of childlike sex dolls from its marketplace after a Reuters examination of whether the sale of the products complied with European Union and U.S. laws.】

item.title: 日本制造商工会明年目标是每月基本加薪 77 美元
item.description: 代表大型制造商的日本工会组织周三表示，将争取明年的月基本工资至少增加 12,000 日元（77 美元），与今年的目标相同。【原文：A Japanese labour union group representing major manufacturers said on Wednesday that it would seek an increase of at least 12,000 yen ($77) in monthly base pay for next year, the same target as this year.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称，有美元敞口的欧元区银行需要更多缓冲资金
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）周三表示，拥有大型美元业务的欧元区贷款机构应增加其流动性和资本缓冲，以抵御美国货币的任何紧缩。【原文：Euro zone lenders with big dollar businesses should bulk up their liquidity and capital cushions to withstand any squeeze in the U.S. currency, the European Central Bank said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称现代汽车将因后视镜图像问题召回 143,472 辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，现代汽车美国公司（Hyundai Motor America）将在美国召回143472辆圣达菲（Santa Fe）和圣达菲混合动力车（Santa Fe Hybrid），原因是后视摄像头可能安装不当。【原文：Hyundai Motor America is recalling 143,472 Santa Fe and Santa Fe Hybrid vehicles in the U.S. over rearview cameras which may not have been installed properly, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】
